name: Gitpod
description: Gitpod is a cloud-based IDE that integrates with GitHub, allowing developers to create, edit, and test their code in a pre-configured workspace.

name: Codepen
description: An amazing online community for testing and showcasing HTML, CSS, JavaScript code snippets.

name: Tryit
description: Another online platform for testing codes written in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

name: OnlineGDB
description: OnlineGDB is an online integrated development environment (IDE) that provides a convenient platform for coding and testing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Sololearn
description: It's multi-language online code editor test and share your code snippets.

name: CodeChef
description: An online IDE to practice you competitive programming skills. It allows you to code in multiple languages.

name: Visual Studio Code for the Web
description: An online code editor built with Visual Studio Code

name: Replit
description: An online IDE with inbuilt collaborative, hosting  and AI features.

name: Codesandbox
description: A cloud development platform that empowers anyone to code, collaborate, and ship projects of any size from any device in record time.

name: StackBlitz
description: StackBlitz is an online code editor powered by WebContainers that allow users to create, collaborate, and deploy web applications.

name: HackerRank
description: An online IDE to practice you competitive programming skills. It allows you to code in multiple languages.

name: LeetCode
description: LeetCode is the best platform to help you enhance your programming skills, expand your knowledge.

name: Programiz
description: Learn to program with our beginner-friendly tutorials and examples. Read tutorials, try examples, write code, and learn to program.
